sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not associative with respect to intersection.
message_1: Let A = {1, 2} and B = {2, 3}. Find (A × B) ∩ {1} and ((A ∩ {1}) × B) using the properties of Cartesian product and intersection. Show that the result demonstrates that the Cartesian product of two sets is not associative with respect to intersection.
